PM at the Cabinet meeting: We are working on several fronts simultaneously. Overnight we were active against many Hamas targets in Gaza.
The goal of all of our operations is to restore quiet and security to all of Israel's citizens, especially the residents of the south.
Experience proves that at such times we must act responsibly & with equanimity. We will do whatever is necessary to restore quiet and security
Over the weekend we also took determined action against disturbances in Jerusalem and in Arab communities.
We are taking a tough line against anyone who breaks the law and against inciters from whatever side.
There is no place in the State of Israel for stone-throwing at police, throwing firebombs, blocking roads, destroying property.
There's no place for incitement against the existence of the State of Israel. Whoever does not abide by the law will be punished severely.
One can not benefit from National Insurance payments & child allowances and at the same time violate the most basic laws of the State of Israel
I call on the leaders of the Arab public to show responsibility and come out against the disturbances in order to restore quiet.
I would like to send my great appreciation to the police personnel and soldiers for tirelessly dealing with the security of all Israelis.

We held a meeting of the Council of Ministers .. We welcomed the beginning of the new members of the team, and we thank the former members http://t.co/E9axa7vK08
During the session we adopted the strategy of the technology and communications sector of the country until 2021, and includes objectives to enhance quality, speed, infrastructure and others
The strategy includes 36 indicators, such as an increase in broadband speeds of 15 times and 45,000 jobs generated by the sector between 2014 and 2021 in the UAE
Technology has become a part of life, and truly a basic human right, the development of the sector will contribute to the development of life for all segments of society
At our meeting, we also adopted the Executive Regulations of the Federal Law on the Organization of the Notary Public and the introduction of the "Notary Public"
We also adopted the accession of the UAE to the International Bureau of Weights and Measures, and a set of diplomatic and economic agreements
